events.name: Intermediate products and manufacturing applications of lithium
events.wd_label: Intermediate products and manufacturing applications of lithium
events.wd_description: After conversion to intermediate products, lithium is used in various manufacturing and end-use applications, including air conditioning, industrial cooling, thermoplastics, pharmaceuticals, aluminum production, glass and ceramics manufacturing, steel casting, and lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: After conversion to intermediate products, lithium is used in various manufacturing and end-use applications, including air conditioning, industrial cooling, thermoplastics, pharmaceuticals, aluminum production, glass and ceramics manufacturing, steel casting, and lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Air conditioning and industrial cooling
events.wd_description: Lithium is used in air conditioning and industrial process cooling applications.
events.description: Lithium is used in air conditioning and industrial process cooling applications.

events.name: Thermoplastics
events.wd_description: Lithium is used in the production of thermoplastics.
events.description: Lithium is used in the production of thermoplastics.

events.name: Pharmaceuticals
events.wd_description: Lithium is used in pharmaceuticals, specifically for bipolar disorder and depression treatment.
events.description: Lithium is used in pharmaceuticals, specifically for bipolar disorder and depression treatment.

events.name: Aluminum production
events.wd_description: Lithium is used as an alloy in aluminum production to add strength and corrosion resistance.
events.description: Lithium is used as an alloy in aluminum production to add strength and corrosion resistance.

events.name: Glass and ceramics manufacturing
events.wd_description: Lithium carbonate is used in the manufacture of glass and ceramics to allow for lower processing temperatures and thus lower energy input.
events.description: Lithium carbonate is used in the manufacture of glass and ceramics to allow for lower processing temperatures and thus lower energy input.

events.name: Steel casting
events.wd_description: Lithium is used in steel casting applications.
events.description: Lithium is used in steel casting applications.

events.name: Lithium-ion batteries
events.wd_description: Lithium is used in the manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Lithium is used in the manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Dominance of lithium-ion batteries in various markets
events.wd_label: Dominance of lithium-ion batteries in various markets
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the portable electronics, energy storage, and EV markets due to their higher energy densities, which provide more power and higher mileage ranges for EVs. There are five general types of lithium-ion battery chemistries currently in use.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the portable electronics, energy storage, and EV markets due to their higher energy densities, which provide more power and higher mileage ranges for EVs. There are five general types of lithium-ion battery chemistries currently in use.

events.name: Portable electronics market
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the portable electronics market due to their high energy densities.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the portable electronics market due to their high energy densities.

events.name: Energy storage market
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the energy storage market due to their efficiency and reliability.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the energy storage market due to their efficiency and reliability.

events.name: EV market
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the EV market, providing higher energy density and mileage range.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the EV market, providing higher energy density and mileage range.

events.name: Lithium-ion battery chemistries
events.wd_description: There are five general types of lithium-ion battery chemistries: lithium cobalt oxide (LCO), lithium manganese oxide (LMO), lithium iron phosphate (LFP), lithium nickel manganese cobalt (NMC), and lithium nickel cobalt aluminum (NCA).
events.description: There are five general types of lithium-ion battery chemistries: lithium cobalt oxide (LCO), lithium manganese oxide (LMO), lithium iron phosphate (LFP), lithium nickel manganese cobalt (NMC), and lithium nickel cobalt aluminum (NCA).

events.name: Lithium cobalt oxide (LCO)
events.wd_description: LCO is one of the common types of lithium-ion battery chemistries.
events.description: LCO is one of the common types of lithium-ion battery chemistries.

events.name: Lithium manganese oxide (LMO)
events.wd_description: LMO is another common type of lithium-ion battery chemistry.
events.description: LMO is another common type of lithium-ion battery chemistry.

events.name: Lithium iron phosphate (LFP)
events.wd_description: LFP is a type of lithium-ion battery chemistry known for safety and efficiency.
events.description: LFP is a type of lithium-ion battery chemistry known for safety and efficiency.

events.name: Lithium nickel manganese cobalt (NMC)
events.wd_description: NMC is a popular lithium-ion battery chemistry due to its high energy density.
events.description: NMC is a popular lithium-ion battery chemistry due to its high energy density.

events.name: Lithium nickel cobalt aluminum (NCA)
events.wd_description: NCA is a high-energy-density lithium-ion battery chemistry used in various applications.
events.description: NCA is a high-energy-density lithium-ion battery chemistry used in various applications.

events.name: Efforts to shore up domestic supply chains
events.wd_label: Efforts to shore up domestic supply chains
events.wd_description: The Biden administration announced plans to use the Defense Production Act to ramp up the mining and processing of key minerals used in batteries for renewable energy and electric vehicles, providing funding for feasibility studies.
events.description: The Biden administration announced plans to use the Defense Production Act to ramp up the mining and processing of key minerals used in batteries for renewable energy and electric vehicles, providing funding for feasibility studies.

events.name: Defense Production Act
events.wd_description: The Biden administration announced the use of the Defense Production Act to support the mining and processing of key minerals for batteries.
events.description: The Biden administration announced the use of the Defense Production Act to support the mining and processing of key minerals for batteries.

events.name: Funding for feasibility studies
events.wd_description: Companies could receive funding for feasibility studies to extract lithium, nickel, cobalt, graphite, and manganese.
events.description: Companies could receive funding for feasibility studies to extract lithium, nickel, cobalt, graphite, and manganese.

events.name: Domestic supply chain challenges
events.wd_description: Despite funding for feasibility studies, challenges remain in capital expenses for building mining operations and the processing of lithium compounds, which is primarily done in China.
events.description: Despite funding for feasibility studies, challenges remain in capital expenses for building mining operations and the processing of lithium compounds, which is primarily done in China.

events.name: Strength and corrosion resistance in aluminum production
events.description: Lithium is used as an alloy in aluminum production to add strength and corrosion resistance.

events.name: Lower processing temperatures in glass and ceramics manufacturing
events.description: Lithium carbonate allows for lower processing temperatures and thus lower energy input in the manufacture of glass and ceramics.

events.name: Higher energy densities in lithium ion batteries
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries offer relatively higher energy densities, translating to more power and higher mileage ranges, particularly for EVs.

events.name: Major types of lithium ion battery chemistries
events.description: The major types of lithium-ion battery chemistries include LCO, LMO, LFP, NMC, and NCA, all of which contain lithium.

events.name: Manufacturing of lithium ion batteries in Asia
events.description: The manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries primarily occurs in China, Japan, and South Korea.

events.name: Defense Production Act for ramping up mining and processing
events.description: The Biden administration plans to use the Defense Production Act to ramp up the mining and processing of key minerals for renewable energy and EV batteries.

events.name: Processing challenges for lithium carbonate and hydroxide
events.description: The significant risks in the lithium supply chain lie in the processing of lithium carbonate and hydroxide, with 60% of this processing occurring in China.

events.name: Capital expense challenges for domestic projects
events.ta1explanation: There is a concern that while feasibility studies are funded, there is no government assistance for the actual capital expenses associated with building mining operations.
events.description: There is a concern that while feasibility studies are funded, there is no government assistance for the actual capital expenses associated with building mining operations.
